Pet Manager Woods:
Kaiser! Come here...yes...good boy! Oh, hello. Ah, you noticed my pure-bred black-striped Alpen Cougar, eh? It is naturally a violent beast, but if you reise it right from birth you can train it to be as gentle as a lamb. Just remember to feed it on time!
Listen to instructions about how to raise a pet.
Purchase pet items.
Exchange pet equipment for higher-grade one.
Exchange the hatchling equipment with the strider equipment.
Evolve pet.
Exchange the pet trade ticket with a pet.
Sell an items.
See the lord and get the tax rate information.
